Summary: Bright glowing disk with glowing tube like structure morphing ~1000 ft above disk
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Covina
There were no other sightings in Covina on or around November 22nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was coming home from ralph's, i turned left on bellaire from chandler blvd. as i headed toward cumpston, i noticed what i thought might be a glowing balloon n\nw. as i watched the object it began to morph into different tubular shapes. the morphing tube moved rapidly from left to right. i noticed below the tube was a bright glowing disk that remained stationary. if i guessed the altitude, i would say 8k to 10k off the ground. this occured in full daylight, near old radio towers. i watched the object for at least five minutes and drove down cumpston to my home to get a camera. when i returned, there was no trace of either the tube or disk.
